sentences.sContent: Our summers are short and our winters long.In December, when it is darkest, we only have a few hours of very weak sunlight per day.
sentences.sContent_eng: Our summers are short and our winters long.In December, when it is darkest, we only have a few hours of very weak sunlight per day.
sentences.sCn: 我们的夏天很短但是冬天很长，在十二月，也就是最黑的时候，我们的一天中只有很短的时间可以看到微弱的阳光。

sentences.sContent: I send out Valentine’s cards with the girls’ photo, instead of trying to mail cards in December.
sentences.sContent_eng: I send out Valentine’s cards with the girls’ photo, instead of trying to mail cards in December.
sentences.sCn: ——我寄出有女孩子照片的情人节贺卡，以代替试图在十二月寄出的贺卡。

sentences.sContent: ...my sister’s birthday is December 9th and her golden birthday would have been the year she turns 9 years old...
...But chances are it won’t have much impact on the human tendency to resolve to get to the gym more and avoid chocolate cake when the clock strikes midnight on December 31...
...they will meet in Copenhagen in December to negotiate a new international climate treaty...

trans.tranOther: the 12th month of the year, between November and January
